definitions.title: n.pr. terr. et gent.
definitions.body: ´[[ק]]: orig. house of Aram Am 9:7; [[קִ֫ירָה]] as place of exile Am 1:5, 2Ki 16:9 (LXX th\n po/lin); [[קִיד]] as people in As. army Is 22:6 (v:Is 22:5 vid. 1. [[קִיד]] ad fin.).—Location dub., v. conspectus of older views Dr:Am 1:5; plausible is some tribe in S. Babylonia, E. of Tigris Wkl AT Unters 178, cf. Hal:REJ xi. 60;—WMM:Hast. DB KIB everywhere del., or em. [[קוֹעַ]], but v. I. [[קִיד]]
